title: Boards Level Not Updating
body: I am level 5 in game but I am unable to post anything outside of Help and Support/Mechs vs Minions, because the Boards thinks I am only level 1. I heard that it updates after posting. Otherwise how do I fix this problem?

replies.body: Sometimes an account has to sync with the boards when it's first posting.  Your level seems to be showing correctly now so the sync should have gone through.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
